text: Jake Andrews (born 14 October 1997) is an English professional footballer who plays for Torquay United as a midfielder. On 31 January 2018, Andrews joined League Two side Cheltenham Town on loan until the end of the season. He made his English Football League debut as a substitute in Cheltenham's 5–1 victory over Port Vale, on 10 February 2018. Jake is the cousin of former Bristol City, Birmingham City FC, Derby County FC, Cheltenham Town and current first team coach at Brighton & Hove Albion W.F.C. title: Jake Andrews (footballer)
